sn56.52:1.1: “Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, pokkharani pannasayojanani ayamena, pannasayojanani vittharena, pannasayojanani ubbedhena, punna udakassa samatittika kakapeyya.
sn56.52:1.4: katamam nu kho bahutaram—yam va kusaggena ubbhatam, yam va pokkharaniya udakan”ti?
sn56.52:1.5: “Etadeva, bhante, bahutaram, yadidam—pokkharaniya udakam; appamattakam kusaggena udakam ubbhatam.
sn56.52:1.6: Sankhampi na upeti, upanidhampi na upeti, kalabhagampi na upeti pokkharaniya udakam upanidhaya kusaggena udakam ubbhatan”ti.
